title: Weak/Auto Fill Password
content:
Summary:
https://mtnc-selfservice.mtncameroon.net
The following url has admin/admin as user name and password
Steps To Reproduce:
open the url in any browser of your choice
enter admin as user name and password
booom .... full asset to super admin full panel
Supporting Material/References:
See attached screenshots
Impact
Attacker can make major configuration changes to the services.
steps: Open the URL https://mtnc-selfservice.mtncameroon.net in any browser
Enter 'admin' as both username and password
vuln_description: The URL https://mtnc-selfservice.mtncameroon.net has a default username and password set to 'admin'/'admin', allowing anyone to gain super admin access without authentication.
reason: The vulnerability involves no complex interactions or multiple components. It is a straightforward case of default credentials being left in place, which is a common and easily identifiable issue.
